pullrequest.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw:
This file contains invalid geometry for extrusion. Unfortunately, GTS does not refuse to triangulate it, but returns invalid geometry.
We should decide if the file is a valid input. I don't think it is in scope right now (it contains a closed loop that is not the contour of a surface, aka 1 closed manifold), but like chassis.svg we can decide to add functionality to make it work, or stop before the triangulation: checking for overlaps and intersections.

I created issue #1630 to keep track of this.
content.html:
This file contains invalid geometry for extrusion. Unfortunately, GTS does not refuse to triangulate it, but returns invalid geometry. We should decide if the file is a valid input. I don't think it is in scope right now (it contains a closed loop that is not the contour of a surface, aka 1 closed manifold), but like chassis.svg we can decide to add functionality to make it work, or stop before the triangulation: checking for overlaps and intersections.

I created issue #1630 to keep track of this.
